# Random Webapp Project

This is a random webapp built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ready for GitHub integration.

## Project Overview
- **Type**: Web Application
- **Technologies**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+)
- **Version Control**: Git/GitHub

## Development Guidelines
- Follow modern web development best practices
- Keep code clean and well-documented
- Use semantic HTML
- Write modular and reusable JavaScript
- Ensure responsive design

## Project Structure
```
/
├── .github/
│   └── copilot-instructions.md
├── css/
│   └── style.css
├── js/
│   └── app.js
├── index.html
└── README.md
```
